content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=0-2)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore
- Stone furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4, y=4)
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) processing copper ore

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5,11.5) storing iron plates
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Water pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5)
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5)
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Science Pack Processing (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position implied near y=28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,30.5)
- Input chest at position(0.5,31.5) storing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Monitor coal levels in inventory - multiple instances of running out of coal for inserters and furnaces
- Keep track of iron ore levels - unable to insert iron ore due to empty inventory
- Ensure continuous supply of raw materials to prevent production stoppages

### Crafting Chain Errors
- Unable to craft logistic science packs due to missing prerequisites in the production chain
- Electronic circuit production blocked due to missing copper cables
- Ensure all components in crafting chains are being produced before attempting to craft higher-tier items

### Production Line Issues
- Furnace 3 experiencing "no ingredients to smelt" warning - ensure consistent material supply
- Electronic circuit assembler showing ingredient shortage for copper cables - establish reliable copper cable production
